Name: Banana Smoothie
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Banane du Brésil liqueur
Instructions: BLEND ingredients with 6oz scoop of crushed ice. Pour into glass and serve immediately with straws.
Review: Packed with fruit, this creamy banana flavoured shake is 'hardened' with a double measure of vodka.
History: Created in 2011 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England.
